ComicInfo.Title: The Stork Brief; If You Can't Be Good . . .; The Mink As A Healer?; It's Not What You Think; Masters And Slaves
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Stork Brief: In order to convince Nikki that she doesn't want to have a baby, Skyler arranges for her to babysit the fourteen month old child of a friend for a little dose of reality.
If You Can't Be Good . . .: A woman summons a demon from Hell to have sex with her.
The Mink As A Healer?: Laura sneaks into a hospital during the night and uses her powers to cure a severely burned young boy.
It's Not What You Think: Dix gets a creamy white substance squirted in her face.
Masters And Slaves: After a long hard day, a demon elf relaxes at home with her sub.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:26:56. [Issue ID 248484]
